message.content:
Probabilistic Methods, Rule Learning. 

Probabilistic Methods: The paper discusses learning algorithms for text categorization that map text to a high-dimensional feature space. The algorithms are based on probabilistic methods that learn a linear separator in the feature space. 

Rule Learning: The paper discusses mistake-driven learning algorithms for text categorization that learn a linear separator in the feature space. The algorithms are based on rule learning, where the rules are represented as linear separators in the feature space. The paper also discusses modifications to the algorithms to better address the specific characteristics of the text processing domain.
